ygData.subject: All Is Fare In Love & War
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Hot Rod is not on the bridge, so he cant be talking to Arc. Sorry KSL, I ll start useing a differant tittle. ... He laughed, seeing if she could catch it.

OOC: Hot Rod is not on the bridge, so he cant be talking to Arc. Sorry
KSL, I'll start useing a differant tittle.

::Hot Rod::

He laughed, seeing if she could catch it.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit waited for his love to return.

::K9::

Continued to nurse his hangover.

OOC: Damn, I got to go to school!
